name: PrimaryTHAProcedure
title: Primary THA Procedure
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent primary Total Hip Arthroplasty (THA) procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with codes that identify primary THA procedures. This is a grouping of CPT, HCPCS and SNOMED CT codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes codes for revision or partial hip arthroplasty procedures.)
